channel.title: The Big Idea
channel.description:
This year has been one of the most controversial years in RuneScape history, and it isn't exactly considered 'great' either. There have been tons of feedback from people that have been giving negative comments about the Evolution of Combat. The game has changed a great bit when being compared from years ago, but it has also changed a lot since the past year. People need to focus on the idea that RuneScape will never go back down the same path they have so long walked from, simply because it is not an option. You cannot and bring back the past, because those things happened due to a set of certain actions, which will never occur in the same exact manner again. There is no way we can possibly know what the future of RuneScape is, but it will not be a link to the past.
My point is that many people loved RS2, whether the reason remains to be nostalgia or pure dedication and desire; however, there is no way we can reverse the course of actions that are now the past. No one is completely happy with the new RuneScape, but it is the future of the game itself, so we need to either embrace it or move on. Everything in this world changes, even if it isn't for the better of everyone.

item.title: The Big Idea
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

[quote=“runescape sucks, post:8, topic:480363”]Off topic: Didn’t project06 already have like 5,000 duping methods already?

On topic:

[quote author=Tutorial link=topic=598598.msg4209574#msg4209574 date=1359344782]No one is completely happy with the new RuneScape
[/quote]
I actually disagree, I am not happy with the new updates, you are not happy with the new updates, but their are people that completely love the new combat system.[/quote]
I never said I wasn’t happy with the system, as I really enjoy it; however, it takes a vast amount of adjustment to get used to the game in its new stage. Also, I highly doubt there is someone that is completely happy with everything in these new updates.

Read full topic

item.title: The Big Idea
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

SpaceRSPS:

You must know with any server the dupes need to replicated and abused first before they can be found and patched. I’m sure you two morons have had your shitty PIs duped many times.

PI? PI is for noobs, literally. I hardly even mess around with programming RSPS as it is, I’ve moved on to actual Java.

Oh, and stop trying to start a fight, I never said that it was funny or anything.

Read full topic

item.title: The Big Idea
item.dc:creator: @Anieli Anieli
item.description:
@Anieli wrote:

People don’t seem to realize that if they did release a 2005/6 server then for a while anyway they gameplay would be horrible. Thousands of glitches they worked on patching suddenly become unpatched.

It would take allot of resources to patch it all again which I don’t think Jagex would spare.

Read full topic

item.title: The Big Idea
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

The nostalgia is strong with this one:

I laugh at people like him who believe that if they change back the game it will all be the same as before when in reality it’s just nostalgia messing with his head.

The term nostalgia describes a sentimental longing for the past, typically for a period or place with [b]happy personal associations[/b].
What actually happens is, you grow up and you get sick of playing the same thing even if it gets updates. I personally started logging in less these days not because of the updates, but because I just seem to have grown out of this game now. Wouldn't play a 2005/2006 version either, those were just happy childhood memories.

Read full topic
